mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM, ASELECT, TITLE, MAX_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(ANUM) FROM AFTER_LIST WHERE STATE=1 AND ANUM=A.NUM) AS TOCNT FROM AFTER A ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT A.NUM, CSELECT, TITLE, MAX_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(ANUM) FROM CULTURE_LIST WHERE STATE=1 AND ANUM=A.NUM) AS TOCNT FROM CULTURE A ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE AFTER_LIST SET STATE=#{state} WHERE ID=#{id} AND ANUM=#{anum}
UPDATE CULTURE_LIST SET STATE=#{state} WHERE ID=#{id} AND ANUM=#{anum}
mapper.insert: insert into schadul(year, month, day, state, title) values( #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{state}, #{title})
mapper.delete: delete from schadul where year=#{year} AND month=#{month} AND day=#{day}
